name: modaledit-line-indicator
description: Dynamic line highlight for ModalEdit modes (normal, insert, visual, search). Changes line highlight color and style based on current mode for instant visual feedback.

commands.title: ModalEdit Line Indicator: Show Log File
ModalEdit Line Indicator: Query Current Mode (Debug)
ModalEdit Line Indicator: Clear Log File

modaledit-line-indicator.enabled.description: Enable or disable the line highlight indicator

modaledit-line-indicator.logLevel.description: Logging verbosity level. error: only errors (default), warn: errors and warnings, info: general lifecycle events and mode changes, debug: detailed diagnostics including cursor state and theme resolution

modaledit-line-indicator.normalMode.description: Normal mode line highlight configuration. Supports theme-specific overrides with [dark], [light], [highContrastDark], and [highContrastLight] keys. Common properties (background, border, borderStyle, borderWidth) apply to all themes unless overridden. Theme fallback: HC Dark → [dark] → common → defaults; HC Light → [light] → common → defaults.

modaledit-line-indicator.insertMode.description: Insert mode line highlight configuration. Supports theme-specific overrides with [dark], [light], [highContrastDark], and [highContrastLight] keys. Common properties (background, border, borderStyle, borderWidth) apply to all themes unless overridden. Theme fallback: HC Dark → [dark] → common → defaults; HC Light → [light] → common → defaults.
